attributes.action: Stop Theresa May from putting her deal forward for a fourth time
attributes.additional_details:
Theresa May has achieved one thing in the past three years. She has united remainers and brexiteers against her deal. No one wants it. MPs don’t want it, remainers don’t want it and those who voted leave don’t either.
Please listen Mrs May, we don’t want your deal. It’s time to take it off the table, your deal is dead.
attributes.background: Theresa May is making our country a global laughing stock and is making a mockery of Parliamentary Sovereignty. The word of our elected MPs is important and should be heard. They speak for us. She is ignoring them time and time again. Enough is enough.
